law.catch_line: A member who, on a prior termination of service, withdrew accumulated contributions from the Judges'...
law.text: A member who, on a prior termination of service, withdrew accumulated contributions from the Judges' Retirement System may receive service credit for the period of service during the previous membership if, within 1 year after the member's restoration of membership, the member redeposits in a single payment the withdrawn accumulated contributions plus regular interest to the date of redeposit.
